name: Dogma (itch) (BitBandit98)
description:
Hello! And welcome to Dogma!

Dogma is a ideological warfare game which has you take over the world - one country at a time - with your very own ideology!

This is a student project created by 1 programmer and 1 artist as a major project over the course of a 12 week period.

Should you be stuck, check the instructions page, as well as the in game tutorial.

We hope you enjoy the game!
